unsupported.title: Unsupported query
unsupported.description: Free text search can be used for exploration, but do not have download support.
unsupported.error: This query looks like it is unsupported
redirectNotice:
You are about to download, to do so you will be redirected to GBIF.org. 

 Be aware that an account is needed to download the content.

note.title: Note
note.description: The easiest way to download and explore data is via the occurrence search user interface. But for complex queries and aggregations, the SQL editor provides more freedom.

errors.networkErrorDescription: Could not validate SQL because of a network error

request.weHaveRestoredYourPredicate: We have restored the predicate your were working on last time you where here.

errors.failedToVisualizePredicate: Failed to visualize predicate. Displaying raw JSON

downloadOptions.chooseChecklistDescription: Select which taxonomic checklist to use for organizing the names in your download
